templates.name: welcome_email
templates.subject: Welcome to {business_name} - Let's Find Your Perfect Home
templates.body:
Hi {name},

Thank you for reaching out to {business_name}! We're excited to help you find your perfect property.

Our team will be in touch within 24 hours to discuss your needs.

Best regards,
{business_name} Team
